/** * Collection of symbols used to parse a Schema Grammar. * * @xerces.internal * * @author jeffrey rodriguez * @version $Id: SchemaSymbols.java,v 1.10 2004/10/29 05:05:13 mrglavas Exp $ */
unit.class:
public final class SchemaSymbols {
// strings that's not added to the schema symbol table, because they // are not symbols in the schema document. // the validator can choose to add them by itself.
// the following strings (xsi:, xsd) will be added into the // symbol table that comes with the parser
// xsi attributes: in validator
public static final String
URI_XSI =
"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance".
intern ()
;
public static final String
XSI_SCHEMALOCATION =
"schemaLocation".
intern ()
;

XSI_NONAMESPACESCHEMALOCATION =

intern ()
